projects.title: DAPY P6: Just Stream it
projects.description: Front-end / Javascript project. "Consume" a public API listing movies and display its content in an interactive "Netflix-like" fashion with carousels.

projects.title: DAPY P4: Chess tournament manager
projects.description: Console app. Allows to add, display and modify players in database, and assist user in matching players and keeping track of results.
